title: PMS 2.0 762 - OVERREACTION MONDAY, NFL Week 6 Recap, Monday Night Football Preview, Feel The Beat With Sal Capaccio, Sheena Quick, Mark Kaboly, & Rick Stroud, + Jordan Poyer, Ian Rapoport, & AJ Hawk
description: On today’s show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys overreact to everything that happened in week 6 of the NFL season including the Colts getting a much needed win late over the Jaguars, the Jets dominating the Packers at Lambeau, if things are troubling in Tampa Bay with Tom after an ugly loss to a depleted Steelers team, if the Giants are for real, the Eagles continuing to win, and everything else happening around the league. Joining the progrum to Feel The Beat around the league are Sal Capaccio with the Buffalo Bills (15:10-25:15), Sheena Quick with the Carolina Panthers (26:57-34:05), Mark Kaboly with the Pittsburgh Steelers (36:01-45:46), and Rick Stroud with the Tampa Bay Bucs (46:38-56:50). Later, All-Pro Safety for the Buffalo Bills and friend of the progrum, Jordan Poyer, joins the show live from a sprinter van on his way back to Buffalo after having to drive across country to play the Chiefs due to his lung injury, his mindset going into the game after having a much different routine leading up to the game, his thoughts on the Bills as a whole, having a bye week this early in the season, and more (1:03:15-1:08:56). Lastly, joining the progrum to give all the injury updates around the league and chat about the Panthers officially trading Robbie Anderson to the Cardinals after his blow up on the sideline yesterday is Senior NFL Insider for the NFL Network, host of the weekly wrap-up with Rapsheet and Friends, Ian Rapoport (1:24:04-1:39:34). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow for Aaron Rodgers Tuesday, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
